name: Fighting Fantasy Game Engine
short_description: The Fighting Fantasy Engine is an Open Source project that allows you to play and author text adventures similar to the Fighting Fantasy gamebooks created by Steve Jackson and Ian Livingstone. Creating games is simple and very easy to play.
